sentences.english: According to the regulations of Ministry of Education, hourly payment is based on the actual teaching hours.

sentences.english: The Education Department said coaching was 'a private matter for parents'.
sentences.chinese: 州教育部說補習是家長們私人的事務。

sentences.english: In Beijing, the Education Ministry has approved more courses in traditional Confucian culture.
sentences.chinese: 在北京，教育部批准增加更多與儒家文化相關的課程。

sentences.english: Chinese Education Department also made an urgent announcement, appeal people to raise alertness.
sentences.chinese: 中國教育部週四也發出緊急通知，呼籲提高警戒。

sentences.english: The Education Department willrewardaward the first grants early next year.

sentences.english: Wang Xuming, former spokesman for the Ministry of Education, feels the same way.

sentences.english: He has been at his new post as minister of the Education Department.

sentences.english: Some Leaders from the Ministry of Education and local government attended the ceremony.

sentences.english: He was an assistant education secretary under President Bush.

sentences.english: Approved by the Ministry of Education in 2004 changed its name to Shanghai Maritime University.
sentences.chinese: 2004年經教育部批准更名爲上海海事大學。

sentences.english: However, Preston is not accredited by a United States Department of Education recognized accrediting body.
sentences.chinese: 但是，普萊斯頓大學沒有獲得美國教育部的認證。

sentences.english: A basic education of the Ministry of Education deputy director Wang Ding-hua said.
sentences.chinese: 教育部基礎教育一司副司長王定華說。

sentences.english: She was ticketed for a job as Minister of Education.
The education secretary was pilloried in the press for his ridiculous decision.
sentences.chinese: 教育部長因其荒唐的決定，而在報刊上受到吐嘈。
